---
title: "Regressors of Chinese New year on Import/Export"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(seasonal)
data(seasonal)
data(holiday)
```
Considering after 2000
```{r}
imports <- window(imp, start = 2000)
```
Generate time-series based on genhol()
```{r}
cny.ts <- genhol(cny, start = -1, end = 6, center = "calendar")
```
```{r}
m1 <- seas(imports, xreg = cny.ts, regression.usertype = "holiday", x11 = list())
summary(m1)
```
```{r}
plot(m1)
```
